column3: No racism, anti-trans, homophobia or hate of any kind
No racism, antisemitism, misogyny, queermisia, cissexism, xenomisia, ableism, ageism or other kinds of bigotry or "othering"
No Racism, antisemitism, religious hate, homophobia, trans phobia, xenophobia.  Claustrophobia and acrophobia are permitted.
No racism, antisemitism, sexism, homophobia, or transphobia.

No Racism, Bigotry, transphobia, body shaming, kink shaming.
This includes "chasers" and other forms of unwanted fetishization.
No racism, fascism, nationalism, extremism, fundamentalism, bigotism, homophoby
No racism, hate speech, etc.
No racism, hate, violence or bullying.
No racism, homophobia, biphobia, transphobia, misogyny, Islamophobia, anti-Semitism etc.
No racism, homophobia, transphobia allowed
No racism, homophobia, transphobia, biphobia, classism, sexism, ableism, or any other systematic discrimination is allowed on GWV.
No racism, homophobia, transphobia, hate speech, sexism, kink-shaming, or body-shaming. This is your only warning.
No racism, homophobia, transphobia, or misogyny.
No racism, homophobia, transphobia, sexism, or bigotry of any kind. Automatic ban or instance block when this is obviously observed.
No racism, homophobia, xenophobia, sexism, discrimination, nazis. üõë

No racism, misogyny, homo/transphobia, ableism or other oppressive behaviour.

No racism, Nazism, sexism.
Racists, Nazis & similar will be removed from this server; they can join plenty of others.
no racism, no sexism, no homophobia, no transphobia...please be nice!!!
